reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, with a perfect fit that's not too tight around the stomach, and one customer notes it falls right above the knee. Moreover, the dress is flattering on multiple body types, effectively hiding extra love around the waist and hips, and one customer mentions it works well with black wedge heels. However, the material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising its lovely feel while others find it cheap, and opinions about sizing are divided between those who say it's true to size and those who find it runs gigantic. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY> THE> DRESS!!!
items.body: Absolutely adorable!!! So happy I bought this dress! I'm 5'2" 109 lbs and the small fit me PERFECT!!! It's a little longer than I would like so I may have it hemmed 2-3". I'm shorter, so this was to be expected. I could also wear taller heels an the length would be fine... The fabric is soft, light-weight and not see-through. There was no weird smell. The pink is very vibrant and the fit under my right arm is great and not tight at all. I will use a strapless bra or one with one strap. Although this dress is "roomy & flowy", it is still very elegant & sexy. Super happy with my purchase and I can't wait to wear it to my Bougie Christmas party where we are all wearing bright pink, orange or red! Read more
items.author: Paris Shop Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas Party Dress!
items.body: I wore this one-shoulder green dress to a Christmas party, and it was absolutely flattering in every way! The green color is rich and festive, perfect for the holiday season. It stands out without being over-the-top, and I felt so confident in it all night long. The one-shoulder design is sleek and modern, adding just the right amount of elegance. It hugs in all the right places and gives a great shape, while still allowing for comfortable movement. The fabric feels luxurious and has just the right amount of stretch to make it both flattering and comfortable. I received tons of compliments at the party, and I felt like a million bucks. If you’re looking for a chic, flattering dress for any special occasion, especially for a festive event like Christmas, this is definitely the one to go for! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: C. McCay

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overly large, but cute.
items.body: Ordered an XL, typically I’m a solid XL. It’s loose enough, I believe I could have used a large. I don’t have time to try a smaller size. If the other dress coming in doesn’t work, I will likely keep. I would say it runs a little big. I did want something loose, but this is so loose it’s not really flattering. Kinda like a sack, but a pretty sack. The pink is very pretty and bright. It was not wrinkled. The way most dresses are would definitely be comfortable for several hours both dancing and sitting. i’m not wearing an appropriate bra in the picture. It’s a sports bra. I was just trying to see if it fit. I carry all of my weight around my waist, which you can see is completely unnoticeable due to the overly large fit. My event is semi formal. Maybe in black it would look more formal, but we were asked to wear pink. I feel the color makes it look more casual. Read more
items.author: DJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps me not look fat
items.body: I’m at that awkward stage of pregnancy where I’m just fat and wide now with no bump and this falls so perfectly I don’t look fat or pregnant! Lifesaver for the gender reveal and my ego which is used to being skinny. Adorable and can dress up with heels or dress down with sandals or wedges. Not the softest fabric but it’s not see-through, however you can’t wear a bra with it cause of the one sleeve and you’d be able to see the lines in the back Read more
items.author: Sarah Abanathie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again!!!
items.body: Loved this dress and I’m not the dress up girl. It fit amazing and was comfortable! Read more
items.author: Lindsey Dover

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and elegant
items.body: Love this dress and the color! I wore this to my friend’s summer wedding. I wasn’t too short or too tight. I bought a Large but usually wear an XL and it fit great. It wasn’t too thin or too thick. It was perfect Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Colors are not, as shown
items.body: My favorite color is pink. But beware. I ordered this purple and got more of a PINK. I LOVE PINK, but I was looking for a purplish this time. It was comfy , and nice. Read more
items.author: Steph Long

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress!
items.body: Looks really good! Fabric was better than i had thought it would be, just needs a good pressing and it should be perfect. not too short, not too long. Read more
items.author: Katherine Cleaver

short_description:
Womens Dress One Shoulder Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress One Shoulder Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Wine Red, Blue, Purple, Purple Red, Army Green, Hot Pink, Mauve, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
